thread.title: Gramercy Property Trust Declares Second Quarter Dividends

author: cnbc.com
title: Gramercy Property Trust Declares Second Quarter Dividends

organizations.name: gramercy property trust gramercy property trust

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Gramercy Property Trust (NYSE: GPT) , a real estate investment trust, announced today that its Board of Trustees declared a second quarter 2018 dividend on the Company’s common shares in the amount of $0.375 per share, payable on July 16, 2018 to common shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 29, 2018.
The Company’s Board also declared a second quarter 2018 dividend on the Company's 7.125% Series A Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Shares in the amount of $0.44531 per share, payable on July 2, 2018 to preferred shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 19, 2018.
About Gramercy Property Trust
Gramercy Property Trust is a leading global investor and asset manager of commercial real estate. The Company specializes in acquiring and managing high quality, income producing commercial real estate leased to high quality tenants in major markets in the United States and Europe.
